comment._content: The caption card is wrong about the rifle. It looks like a Winchester Model 1897 shotgun:

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
LWyman,

You are correct!  That is indeed a Winchester Model 1897 shotgun.  We'll correct the caption when we update the record.  Thanks for your comment.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: On Feb 21, 1914 there was a women's trap-shooting competition at Madison Square Garden. See NYT of Feb 1, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A0CEFDE1E39E633A... Could this have been associated with that event?
